metadata.title: CVE-2017-5188 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
The bs_worker code in open build service before 20170320 followed relativesymlinks, allowing reading of files outside of the package source directoryduring build, allowing leakage of private information.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5188` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

obs-productconverter - 2.9.4-4
obs-server - 2.9.4-4
obs-utils - 2.9.4-4
obs-worker - 2.9.4-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: open-build-service package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.4-4').
